projects.title: Villa Serenity
projects.description: A contemporary coastal villa that seamlessly blends indoor and outdoor living spaces.
projects.details: Villa Serenity embodies the essence of tropical modernism, featuring clean lines, expansive glass walls, and natural materials. The design maximizes ocean views while providing privacy through strategic landscaping. Sustainable features include rainwater harvesting, solar panels, and natural ventilation systems.

projects.title: Urban Loft Residence
projects.description: Industrial-chic loft transformation in the heart of Mumbai's cultural district.
projects.details: This adaptive reuse project transforms a former warehouse into a sophisticated urban dwelling. Exposed brick, steel beams, and concrete floors are complemented by modern amenities and custom furnishings. The open-plan layout maximizes natural light while creating distinct living zones.

projects.title: Mountain Retreat
projects.description: A secluded mountain home designed to harmonize with its natural surroundings.
projects.details: Nestled in the Himalayan foothills, this retreat uses local stone and timber to blend with the landscape. Large windows frame panoramic mountain views, while the compact footprint minimizes environmental impact. Passive solar design ensures comfort year-round.

projects.title: Innovation Tech Campus
projects.description: A collaborative workspace designed to foster innovation and creativity.
projects.details: This tech campus reimagines the modern workplace with flexible spaces that adapt to various work modes. Green terraces, open collaboration zones, and private focus areas create a balanced work environment. LEED Platinum certified with extensive use of renewable energy and biophilic design principles.

projects.title: Heritage Boutique Hotel
projects.description: Restoration and conversion of a 19th-century haveli into a luxury boutique hotel.
projects.details: This sensitive restoration preserves original architectural elements while introducing modern hospitality standards. Traditional courtyards, carved stone facades, and hand-painted frescoes are complemented by contemporary interiors and state-of-the-art amenities.

projects.title: Contemporary Art Gallery
projects.description: A minimalist gallery space designed to showcase contemporary art.
projects.details: Clean white volumes and controlled natural lighting create the perfect backdrop for art. Flexible wall systems allow curators to reconfigure spaces for different exhibitions. The design balances architectural restraint with dramatic spatial experiences.

projects.title: Eco Resort & Spa
projects.description: A sustainable wellness resort integrated into a tropical rainforest setting.
projects.details: Built with minimal site disruption, this resort uses locally sourced materials and traditional construction techniques. Individual villas are elevated to preserve the forest floor, while a central spa pavilion offers panoramic canopy views. Zero-waste operations and organic farming complete the sustainable vision.

projects.title: Community Arts Center
projects.description: A multi-functional community space promoting arts education and cultural exchange.
projects.details: This community hub features flexible performance spaces, art studios, and exhibition areas. The design emphasizes accessibility and inclusivity, with barrier-free circulation and adaptable spaces. A vibrant colored facade reflects the creative energy within.
